review: Visited the doctor for the issue regarding delayed tooth formation of the kid and other ancillary issues. The doctor was really patient to listen to the problem and explained things very clearly. Very satisfied with the consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very eaze to consult. Dr. Phani Babu sir guide very polite. Actually we came for second opinion, Dr helps me verymuch and explain the thing clearly. I absolutely recommend Dent Eazee

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had appointment with  Dr.Phani Babu for my daughter teeth brace fixing today.
Dr was very kind enough and explained all the options available, pros & cons ,the need with a X-ray report  and clarified all our queries. Dr.Phani Babu was along with us for more than 1hr as my Daughter was quite panic and explained her with samples and examples .She now feels happy with the friendly approach of the Dr and the staffs in the clinic .  We travelled 50  Km to visit the Dr  but felt worth of travel and Money. Looking forward for successful Teeth brace course completion and the final output

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I went for my daughter's tooth cavity doctor Phani has given very excellent care very friendly to patient I strongly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted Dr. Phani Babu for general cleaning I was totally impressed by the way I was treated and this is my first time and the way he followed up issue and gives clear explanation to patients. Clinic looks cozy and neat are friendly staff members.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My husband was a very nervous patient and was always put at ease right before any treatment and everything was explained clearly all the way through by Dr. Phani Babu and Dr.Vimala Geetha(They answered all our questions clearly, even the silly ones) and they were very conscientious of his concerns. He underwent Scaling, Polishing, OPG, Laser dental cleaning, Flouride application, composite filling and soft splint for lower teeth.My husband has very sensitive teeth and the whole treatment was done pain-free. The receptionists and dental assistants are very efficient, thoughtful, kind, helpful and follow-ups are wonderful. Every time we call or come into Dent Eazee, we can expect prompt, courteous, cheerful, gentle service! They have the latest state of the art dental equipment *** ******* *** ****** *************. They are very friendly and talk like an old time friend. Love them both! The clinic is always neat and clean. I highly recommend them to anyone especially to those who are scared of dentists.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

I would recommend this place to anyone looking for quality dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For the discomfort and swelling in our kids' teeth, we went to see Dr. Phani Babu. Through an X-ray, the doctor discovered a cyst in her lower molars and recommended that we have it removed and enucleated, followed by bone grafting. He provided a thorough explanation of the surgery's choices. For the procedure, we chose general anesthesia. We were already aware from prior visits that Dr. Phani and his team would do a fantastic job making the procedure painless for the child and it went exactly as anticipated. Even though the surgery took two hours, our trust in the doctor made us feel secure. After the procedure, the doctor and the clinic personnel patiently answered all of our questions and assisted in my child's quick recovery. We would like to thank him for his technical prowess and thoughtful attention to the patient's dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Phani Babu was very professional and patient. The doctor, staffs, ​and receptionist were friendly. The ambience was great and the clinic was super clean. My son was very nervous first but the doctor explained everything he is doing and put him right at ease. We took our son for removing tartar and Doctor diagnosed the underlying problem for excess tartar formation inspite of regular cleaning. Highly recommend him to anyone looking for a pediatric dentist. *** ** *** **** *********** ** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
***TRUSTWORTHY***



During lockdown I traveled to Chennai for other medical reasons for limited days and I'd been avoiding the dentist for years due to bad experiences in Mumbai (hometown). Then due to a sudden toothache I had to make an emergency appointment for a RCT at Dent Eazee Dental Clinic in Chennai. 
 
Firstly they followed proper lockdown rules during this COVID pandemic which is the best thing. 
 

Trust me, I have experienced one of the best Dental care services at Dent Eazee Dental Clinic. The ambience at Dent Eazee is the best, it’s almost like being in a lounge. Best quality and the first class way that I have been treated. 
 

Dr. Phani & Dr. Vimala – are very professional, ***awesome treatment plan*** (very impressive), excellent, gentle, kind & calm and many more😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Earlier I had met a Dentist in Kerala for my tooth problems 
The Dr did not explain properly and I was confused 
I was referred to Dr Phani Babu and Dr Vimala Geetha
When I met both of them , they examined my teeth ( the few I have) and explained the entire process in detail and I was so very  happy and went ahead with my treatment.
I have got my implants and root canal done and waiting for the teeth to be put in 3 months.
I would recommend Dr Phani Babu and Dr Vimala Geetha to anyone who anyone who has dental problems and I assure you that  you would have a “Wonderful Smile” 😃😃😃😃

tags: None
review:
Dr. Phani, Pediatric dental specialist, was very professional, ************* with clear communication about the existing problem, and treatment plan for my 5-year-old child.

My naughty and playful daughter was well-handled by Dr.Phani with his calm and confident demeanour and got that many procedures done with least inconvenience and best results.  

The regular follow-up calls, messages and emails were very impressive and professionally done. 

My kid was happy to visit him again after 6 months last week, and particularly enjoyed the kid-friendly ambience and play tools in the clinic. 

One of the best Kids dental clinic i have ever seen !!! Glad to see them in our city... 

Will strongly recommend especially for all Kids dental treatments with Dr. Phani and Dr. Vimala Geetha.

All the best and cheers !!!

tags: None
review: He has come across to me a very trustful doctor. The lucidity and clarity in which he explains whats going on with your teeth and the proposed treatment plan, it makes you feel very relaxed and a sense of assurance that you are at safe hands. Out of many visits I have made, every single time he had only instilled more confidence and belief that you are given best possible treatment. Above all, he does check back with you after the treatment on regular basis on how you are feeling which reassures the he his genuinely concerned about the longevity of your teeth.
reply_text:
Thank you very much sir..it is a privilege to get good and understanding people like ur family as patients. Hope we have done to the best of our potential.
Team Denteazee speciality dental centres.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Phani has been more of a family dentist to us  . We first took my younger son Sukirthan with tooth decay in many of his teeth. First we were told that procedure must take place in a operation theatre , but since he was a small child at first we were apprehensive. So he patiently removed the tooth over a period of time, with little discomfort . We are grateful to him for this .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

Both of them well explained what kind of treatment my son needed.It was satisfying by taking away all our concerns.The course of treatment is for few months. The team followed up after the procedure to know about the child's status. Best place for dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Phani Babu is amazing in every way in caring for the patient! ** ** **** ************* *** always positive and assuring. I have a had a bad bite and TMJ issues for many years now, and he has helped me significantly. I am going through the Invisalign treatment and he has been there in every step to help overcome challenges. He is very punctual for all his appointments and is a great human being. Very happy to have found this doctor and clinic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My Child who is 6 yrs old had 8 cavities and RCT cudn’t be possible considering the age, co operation level and pain. Jointly with our consent Dr. Babu decided to do crowning in one go with GA administration which was completed within few hrs. As every parent we were nervous but Dr. Babu had kept us in comfort by explaining every procedure and with personal phone calls. The child was up in running in half a day no discomfort, pain or whatsoever.
A BIG THANK YOU DR. BABU!!!
reply_text: Thank u very much for ur feedback Mrs Payal.
